output: html_document

#Load Packages
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(gtsummary)
library(sf)
library(tmap)


```
#Import data 
```{r}
#Import ecoregion shape file from EPA/USGS Level III 
ecoregionshape<-st_read("./ca_eco_l3/ca_eco_l3.shp")
head(ecoregionshape)

#Import site information 
site<-read.csv("./spatialinfofinal.csv")
head(site)
#Convert to spatial object 
site.sf <- st_as_sf(site, coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326) 
site.sf

 tm_shape(ecoregionshape) + tm_polygons(col="grey", border.col="white")

#Look at geometry type
st_geometry_type(ecoregionshape)

#Check CRS (coordinate reference system)
st_crs(ecoregionshape)




ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = ecoregionshape, size = 3, color = "black", fill = "cyan1") + 
  ggtitle("AOI Boundary Plot") + 
  coord_sf()

```
